segments.text: Can you help me ? The program is not responding and I don't know what to do .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at the icon in the bottom corner of your screen . Is it flashing ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . Try closing down all the files you're not using at the moment .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: But I can't move the cursor at all . My screen is frozen . What should I do ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Have you tried pressing the Escape key ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK , you â€™ ll need to reboot your machine . Press Control , Alt and Delete at the same time .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I've never done that before . Will I lose all my files ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You might lose the file you were working on , but don't worry , the help desk can restore it . When did you last take a backup ?
segments.speaker: S2
